attributes.action: FREE up enpty government building for companies willing to train young people
attributes.additional_details: Government building to be available at low rental rates for companies willing to train Young People under the age of 25. There is a struggle to locate affordable buildings  to train more potential entrepreneurs, future CEO's and help to create new business models through our brand of ground breaking marketing software. The aim will be to first inspire young people to want to earn or learn. So please back this petition to free up empty properties to corporations willing to train young people.
